text: Hotel lobby with a reception desk and suitcases on the floor next to Emma.
Good afternoon. I have a booking for two nights. My name is Emma Lewis.
Welcome, Ms Lewis. Let me check your reservation. Yes, a double room with a balcony for two nights.
Close-up of the receptionist typing on the computer.
Is breakfast included in the price?
Yes, it is. Breakfast is served from seven to ten in the restaurant on the ground floor.
Medium shot – Emma looks around the lobby.
Great, thank you. And what time is dinner served?
Dinner is from six thirty to nine thirty. You can also order snacks from the bar during the day.
Reception area with brochures and a small table with coffee.
Are there any special services at the hotel?
Yes, there’s a swimming pool, a small gym and free Wi-Fi in every room. You can also book a massage or rent bicycles at reception.
Emma smiles and takes her room key.
You’re very welcome. Your room is on the second floor. Have a nice stay.
